articles.author: David Bauder
articles.title: Fox News and 2020 election lies set to face jury come Monday - The Associated Press
articles.description: NEW YORK (AP) — Starting Monday in a courtroom in Delaware, Fox News executives and stars will have to answer for their role in spreading doubt about the 2020 presidential election  and creating the gaping wound that remains in America's democracy .
articles.content: NEW YORK (AP) Starting Monday in a courtroom in Delaware, Fox News executives and stars will have to answer for their role in spreading doubt about the 2020 presidential election and creating the gap… [+7166 chars]

articles.author: Michael Lee
articles.title: Budweiser releases new pro-America ad with iconic mascot in wake of Anheuser-Busch Mulvaney controversy - Fox Business
articles.description: A new Budweiser ad released on social media features patriotic images and messages about the "American Spirit" in the wake of their parent company's recent controversy.
articles.content:
Budweiser has released a new patriotic advertisement as its parent company struggles with controversy over its endorsement partnership with transgender influencer Dylan Mulvaney.

articles.title: Marjorie Taylor Greene Warns of Government 'Control' Amid Intel Leak - Newsweek
articles.description: Congresswoman Marjorie Taylor Greene claimed that Americans are on "the verge of losing more freedoms" in the wake of the Pentagon leak.
